en-us: Nose—ring that is said to have been owned by↵Marduk, the storm deity.

en-us: Ring imbued with the essence↵of a salamander fire spirit.

en-us: Tongue stud favored by the fire god Tamulis.

en-us: Arm bracelet imbued with the essence↵of an undine water spirit.

en-us: Balm used by the great knight Agrias↵as told in the Zodiac Brave Story.
